-/-

Check if advance width match base glyph advance width. eg. if the width of iacute is the same like i.

No composits.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Info

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx/CFF

Advance width

Advance width of hmtx and CFF table should be the same (tolerance 2 units).

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Info

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

glyf

Contours

.notdef should be TOFU.

.notdef has 5 contours. It looks like it is a TOFU with a cross.

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Pass

265 = 265

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Warning

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

glyf

-/-

Glyphs (LATIN) which chould be made from components (in many cases).
Please investigate and approve if correct.

'Aring' (uni00C5) (ID 153)

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

glyf

Index 2

'CR' should have no contours.

OK: 'CR' has 0 contours.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'CR' should match the space width.

'CR' advance width '1024' does not match the space width '265'.
If the width matches the original font's index 2 width, it does not need to be changed.

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

table version 3.

italic flag

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

static font

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

name

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '22'
'Mukta Malar ExtraLight'

Pass

name

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.538;PS 1.000;hotconv 16.6.51;makeotf.lib2.5.65220; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.538'.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '21'
'MuktaMalar-ExtraLight'

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mukta Malar' + 'Space' + NID 17 'ExtraLight' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar ExtraLight'.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mukta Malar'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mukta Malar ExtraLight'

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

OK: NID 1 length is '11'

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

'Mukta Malar'

Mac NID 2

NID 2 is 'Light'
but should be one of these:
'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

NID 4 'Mukta Malar Light' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar' + 'space' + NID 2 'Light'

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.538;PS 1.000;hotconv 16.6.51;makeotf.lib2.5.65220; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.538'.

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '16'
'MuktaMalar-Light'

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0

MS NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mukta Malar' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar Light'.

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mukta Malar'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mukta Malar Light'

Error

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 7 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 7, Trademark' (Mac/Roman/English)

Trademark NID 7 (Mac/Roman/English) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '11'
'Mukta Malar'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Demi, Ex, Semi, X, Xtra, Ultra, Extra, Dm, Sm'

Pass

'Mukta Malar'

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.538;PS 1.000;hotconv 16.6.51;makeotf.lib2.5.65220; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.538'.

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'MuktaMalar-Regular'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Mukta Malar'
MS is: 'Mukta Malar'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Regular'
MS is: 'Regular'

Pass

Mukta Malar Regular (MuktaMalar-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 3

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '2.538;EKTF;MuktaMalar-Regular'
MS is: '2.538;EKTF;MuktaMalar-Regular'

Pass

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Version 2.538;PS 1.000;hotconv 16.6.51;makeotf.lib2.5.65220; ttfautohint (v1.6)'
MS is: 'Version 2.538;PS 1.000;hotconv 16.6.51;makeotf.lib2.5.65220; ttfautohint (v1.6)'

Pass

name

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'MuktaMalar-Regular'
MS is: 'MuktaMalar-Regular'

name

Mac NID 0

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

name

Mac NID 6

(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'MuktaMalar-Medium'

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

name

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mukta Malar' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar Medium'.

Pass

Mukta Malar Medium Regular (MuktaMalar-Medium.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
MS is: 'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'

Error

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Mukta Malar'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Mukta Malar Medium'

Error

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mac NID 5

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'MuktaMalar-SemiBold'

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0

MS NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

OK: NID 1 length is '20'
'Mukta Malar SemiBold'

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'MuktaMalar-SemiBold'

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mukta Malar SemiBold Regular (MuktaMalar-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mukta Malar' + 'Space' + NID 17 'SemiBold' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar SemiBold'.

Pass

Windows NID 4 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 4, Full Font Name' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Full Font Name is present.

Pass

Trademark NID 7 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '11'
'Mukta Malar'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Demi, Ex, Semi, X, Xtra, Ultra, Extra, Dm, Sm'

Pass

name/OS/2

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Mukta Malar'

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Mukta Malar Bold' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.538;PS 1.000;hotconv 16.6.51;makeotf.lib2.5.65220; ttfautohint (v1.6)' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.538'.

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '15'
'MuktaMalar-Bold'

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. name

Mac NID 0

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

There is something wrong:
'Copyright (c) 2016, Ek Type. All rights reserved.'
Please verify against spec. It should follow this structure:
'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'MuktaMalar-ExtraBold'

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'MuktaMalar-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ek Type', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

NID 11 is www.ektype.in, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ek Type' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Mukta Malar' + 'Space' + NID 17 'ExtraBold' = NID 1 'Mukta Malar ExtraBold'.

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraBold Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1662) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Mukta Malar Bold (MuktaMalar-Bold.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Mukta Malar Light Regular (MuktaMalar-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

OT Features

OT Features

Error

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

There is a subs feature in the font, but the sinf is missing. Please investigate.

Warning

Mukta Malar ExtraLight Regular (MuktaMalar-ExtraLight.ttf)
